Module com.example.towersofhanoi
Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Model

Class AutomaticGame

java.lang.Object
com.example.towersofhanoi.Model.Game
com.example.towersofhanoi.Model.AutomaticGame
public class AutomaticGame extends Game
The AutomaticGame class represents an automatic game of the Towers of Hanoi. It extends the Game class and provides additional functionality for running the game automatically using a recursive algorithm.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over by comparing the number of disks on the last rod with the total number of disks.
      Specified by:
      isGameOver in class Game
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • recursiveHanoi

      public void recursiveHanoi(byte numberOfDisks, char fromRod, char toRod, char auxRod)
      Executes the recursive Towers of Hanoi algorithm to solve the game.
      Parameters:
      numberOfDisks - the number of disks to be moved
      fromRod - the rod to move the disks from
      toRod - the rod to move the disks to
      auxRod - the auxiliary rod

    • runAlgorithm

      public void runAlgorithm(Runnable onFinishCallback)
      Runs the automatic game algorithm in a separate thread and invokes the onFinishCallback upon completion.
      Parameters:
      onFinishCallback - the callback to be executed when the game algorithm finishes
